posts.post_content: Anyone else seeing Green/Black as the most comboriffic duo in Innistrad? Combine with [Tree of Redemption](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tree of Redemption). Also turns your creatures into explosives if you have a [Sanguine Bond](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sanguine Bond) out, so that's another point in this card's favor. This guy could be one hell of a sac outlet, depending on what the rest of the block holds.

posts.post_content:
*The demon Griselbrand dared to stand against Avacyn, earning him the loathing of thousands and the admiration of a few.*  
  
Avacyn, the World Asunder {13}  
Creature- Eldrazi (mythic)  
When you cast Avacyn, the World Asunder, destroy all nonland permanents.  
Trample, Annihilator 5  
13/13  
  
Shocking Twist #1; Awesome!  
Reusing Shocking Twist #1; Absolutely Hilarious! Saves design space! Makes demons seem like good guys! :D
